Candida species is the common cause of mucocutaneous infections and they are responsible for most bloodstream infections. Traditional triazole drugs’ resistance of Candida species has been increased significantly for several years and thus the requirement of novel antifungals is considerable.
26 The results indicated essential oil of Salvia mirzayanii have strong anti- Candida activity with MIC 50 values 0.03 to 1 μL/mL and 0.12 to 1 μL/mL for candidia and azole-resistant candida, respectively.
